Author: Berg#2666
Content:
Would it be possible for KMD to help HUSH by leveraging their scale for marketing?
HUSH has recently upgraded and become a KMD AC, with lots of exciting things in the works.
We're hoping that we can find support in the KMD community to help us gain some traction, whether it be Twitter, Blogs, Forums, Exchange Outreach, etc.
Anything is much appreciated.

If you haven't already, join us on Discord!

https://myhush.org/discord

Author: Audo#5667
Content:
Hey @Berg 

Can you brief us about all the dev things going on? I'm afraid we haven't had the time to follow you guys closely.

It would be great to highlight what kind of contributions your team is making for the Komodo ecosystem.

Author: Berg#2666
Content: We were the first coin to convert to become a KMD Asset Chain, Komodo did a case study on the HUSH v3 upgrade as well, which I'm not sure if it's published or intended to be or not.

Author: Audo#5667
Content:
yeah that one is not published yet.

We will of course promote that once it's out

Author: Berg#2666
Content: Awesome

Author: Berg#2666
Content:
Our biggest concern is our current uphill battle with liquidity, as Cryptopia faltered and left us with extremely low volume.
We're hoping that the Komodo team can assist us with getting our foot in the door for some exchange listings, as we're now extremely easy to list for exchanges that already offer Komodo trading.
I'm hoping that we can work together to help push HUSH in the right direction.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: exchange listings are simply about paying crazy fees. there seems to be no otherway

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: or maybe polish up the whitepaper and do IEO on an exchange and you will get automatically listed on the exchange

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: but there must be a fee for IEO, probably comparable to listing

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: there is no free meals? something like that

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: IF the exchange gets the fees from the funds raised then It's win win, the project gets new funds and listed on exchange at the same time

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: But if the project has to pay the fee upfront, then it is another case

Author: PTYX#6840
Content: IEOs are costing around 10% of funds raised plus a listing fee between 5-30 bitcoins

Author: PTYX#6840
Content: Some exchanges have different arrangements though.
